prompts: Create a majestic flying Pokemon with stormy gray clouds and a robust earthy body.
I want a dual-type Pokemon that embodies both ground and flying elements with a regal appearance.
Generate an imposing Pokemon that controls the weather, featuring swirling clouds and vibrant colors.
Make a powerful legendary Pokemon that looks like a deity of nature with unique elemental powers.
Imagine a mythical creature with a blend of earthy tones and bright accents, soaring through the skies.
Design a Pokemon that strikes fear with its cloud-like form and strong presence in battles.
Give me an ancient-looking Pokemon, capable of manipulating the elements with a strong, grounded body.
